code: import React from'react';import{LayoutDashboard,Users,Radio,CreditCard,Settings,UserCircle,BarChart3,LogOut}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PodPaySidebar=_ref=>{let{activeItem='dashboard',onItemClick=itemId=>{}}=_ref;const menuItems=[{id:'dashboard',label:'Dashboard',icon:LayoutDashboard},{id:'customers',label:'Customers',icon:Users},{id:'podcast',label:'Podcast',icon:Radio},{id:'analytics',label:'Analytics',icon:BarChart3},{id:'transactions',label:'Transactions',icon:CreditCard},{id:'referrals',label:'Referrals',icon:UserCircle},{id:'settings',label:'Settings',icon:Settings}];const handleItemClick=itemId=>{if(onItemClick){onItemClick(itemId);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"podpay-sidebar flex flex-col",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"px-6 py-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-white",children:["Pod",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-white/80",children:"Pay"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-white/60 text-sm mt-1",children:"Main Menu"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"flex-1",children:menuItems.map(item=>{const Icon=item.icon;const isActive=activeItem===item.id;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>handleItemClick(item.id),className:`podpay-sidebar-nav-item w-full text-left ${isActive?'active':''}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{className:"h-5 w-5 mr-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-medium",children:item.label})]},item.id);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"px-6 py-4 border-t border-white/10",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>handleItemClick('logout'),className:"podpay-sidebar-nav-item w-full text-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LogOut,{className:"h-5 w-5 mr-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"font-medium",children:"Log Out"})]})})]});};export default PodPaySidebar;
